page.title: 08 "The Home 1985" Con't
page.content: We also found within our area 8 old cottages built 150-200 years ago.These have recently been renovated with added extensions.However, they have all kept their character and blend in with the neighbouring buildings. The number of rooms varied considerably according to the size and nature of the buildings.The larger farmhouses had up to 18 rooms, whereas the the smaller houses had 6-8 rooms of average size.All were fitted with neccessities and luxuries, a far cry from what life would have been like way back in 1086.Duration of living in their houses ranged from 5 months, this being a small, modernised cottage, to 60 years, this being a farmer and his family.Overall, all the houses were equipped with a large garden, particularly the farm houses.
